dsOverview.title: GFDL SEASAT Scatterometer Derived Winds

summary.p: SEASAT scatterometer derived wind speed and direction, global coverage, July-October 1978, approx. 50 km resolution, objectively dealiased by Robert Atlas at GSFC.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
